org.springframework.web.socket.sockjs.transport.session

Class StreamingSockJsSession

  • java.lang.Object

        • org.springframework.web.socket.sockjs.transport.session.StreamingSockJsSession
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, SockJsSession, WebSocketSession

    public abstract class StreamingSockJsSession
extends AbstractHttpSockJsSession
    A SockJS session for use with streaming HTTP transports.
    Since:
    4.0
    Author:
    Rossen Stoyanchev

      • flushCache

        protected void flushCache()
                   throws SockJsTransportFailureException
        Description copied from class: AbstractHttpSockJsSession
        Called when the connection is active and ready to write to the response. Subclasses should only call this method from a method where the "responseLock" is acquired.
        Specified by:
